title: The abhorring case of Maniput
selftext:
Written primarily because of the angst and remorse I have for the incident in Manipur. Just wish everything will ease down.

[Manipur Viral Video](https://kallolmazumdar.medium.com/manipur-viral-video-feeling-shame-to-be-an-indian-99f88fbeec67)
